name: one-more-big-beautiful-browser
description: One More Big Beautiful Browser - Monorepo with extension, web, and server

scripts.install: pnpm run install:extension && pnpm run install:web && pnpm run install:server
scripts.dev:server: cd server && SERVER_PORT=8080 uv run python main.py
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "extension,web,server" -c "blue,green,yellow" "pnpm run dev:extension" "pnpm run dev:web" "pnpm run dev:server"
scripts.lint: pnpm run format:check && pnpm run lint:extension && pnpm run lint:web && pnpm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run format && cd server && uv run black .
